diagnosis.diagnostic_reasoning: The diagnosis was based on the family history of congenital cataracts and corneal abnormalities, combined with the clinical, histopathologic, and ultrastructural findings that indicate an autosomal dominantly inherited disorder. Key findings included attenuated endothelium, thickened Descemetâ€™s membrane, various-sized vacuoles in the corneal stroma, and distinctive iris abnormalities.
